comments.body: To makes use of media queries we can only make parse and prepare the query based on information we get back from the device. I'm not sure with Android we can get if it's a tablet or not. I think using a max/min width and pixel density are all values we can get back from querying device capabilities.
Tons of detail available in the final comments in this thread: https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!starred/appc-ti-alloy/xgsnEdhfIDo
